field.name: summary
field.value: Added overloaded constructors supporting RangeValidationType and object type conversion

field.name: description
field.value:
** Adds a new constructor to the RangeValidator: public RangeValidator(RangeValidationType type, object min, object max)
This constructor will permit doing the stuff I outlined. The min and max are converted to the appropriate min/max values for the given type using two new private methods, GetIntValue and GetDateTimeValue (which accept an object, attempt to parse it, and default to a provided default value).
** Adds new constructors for ValidateRangeAttribute that mirror the above, allowing the following: [ValidateRange(RangeValidationType.DateTime, "2006-01-01", "2006-12-31")]
** Updates unit tests. Some old code comments were wrong (fixed), and I had the "low and high" validation tests use the new constructors as a way to test the min/max parsing code.
